desc: We are working on a long term SEO project, for our E-commerce Website. We want someone who can assist us on On-the-page-SEO, therefore it's imperative you are knowledgable on all things SEO. Someone who understands UX, User Journey, Bounce Rate, Conversion Rates is essential. We need someone who writes Meta Description with the idea of increasing Click Through & understanding User Journey.This is a long term project, therefore this can turn into a full time job for the right person.We are not interested in an full SEO-Package at the moment, we need someone who can work with us and can bounce ideas and solutions off each other.At the moment we have not uploaded our products, therefore, image optimisation will come later, and we will offload all our images via Amazon CDN. We will also using Cloudflare etc.We need someone who has experience with Canonical, Product Schema, Meta, Title, Alts, Deep Web Links, and so on. Experience with GA is important, we will measure Goals, Conversion, Traffic, Bounce, Avg Session Duration. If you are handy with Excel, it's important so we can track progression, Week to Week, Month to Month.Please let me know how you can help me & any projects you currently worked on. Please also let me know what tools you have used.

desc: Advertising Sales Representative for Agriculture MagazineWe are looking for a sales representative in your area for two of the world leading global agriculture magazines:The Fruit World (fresh produce) and The Clipper (nuts and dried fruit).You work independently and commission-based.AgroPress offers an extremely beneficial commission system. The company has established client relationships and partnerships in the last 75 years.You will support our team selling print and online advertisements, corporate publishing services, web design, video production for the world of perishable items.Candidates with previous advertising sales experience are preferred and an agricultural background is beneficial. You might also be a sales representative in for fertilizers or crop protection products, machinery, technology or software - representing our publications could be an additional income with the same group of clients.About the magazines:The Clipper is the market leader in global information about nuts and dried fruit: Production and Consumption trends, science and technology, marketing and business strategies for Coconuts, Peanuts, Cashew nuts, Almonds, Walnuts, Chestnuts, Betel nuts, Hazelnuts, Pistachios, Kola nuts, Macadamia Nuts, Brazil nuts and dried fruit.Get more information at [url removed, login to view]The Fruit World has been established in 1943. It is distributed in 104 countries with more than 32,000 readers. It is the ideal platform to build trust and relationships across the globe. The Fruit World covers important trends - from new varieties to processing and packaging, marketing, shipping and logistics, digital solutions, politics and the retail sector. Our knowledge goes deeper than the press release: Our correspondents capture important developments all over the globe -traveling more than 400,000 km each year to find out what might be crucial for your future business, with original, hands-on information.Get more information at [url removed, login to view]
title: Sales & Marketing
